title: How to Make Georgian Acharuli Xachapuri

steps.headline: Pre heat the oven to 450 degrees.
Mix 2 eggs in with the Feta and the American cheese.
Make sure the pizza dough is fully defrosted.
Take a hand full of dough.
Flatten the dough into a circular shape.
After flattening the dough give it a football shape form.
steps.description: Once you do that,  fold in the edges of the dough like the crust of a pizza.

steps.headline: Fill the dough in with the cheese until the inside is all covered.
Place it in the oven and bake it for about 20 minutes or until the dough looks a little golden.
Take out the dough.
steps.description: Take a fork and spread apart the cheese in the middle of the dough so it looks like a circular hole. Crack the egg in the middle where you make the hole.

steps.headline: Place more cheese around the egg.
steps.description: Place the dough in the oven for about 5-7 minutes or until the egg is cooked.

steps.headline: Take out the Xachapuri and let it cook for about 5-10 minutes.

text: Pre heat the oven to 450 degrees.  Mix 2 eggs in with the Feta and the American cheese.  Make sure the pizza dough is fully defrosted.  Take a hand full of dough.  Flatten the dough into a circular shape.  After flattening the dough give it a football shape form. Once you do that,  fold in the edges of the dough like the crust of a pizza. Fill the dough in with the cheese until the inside is all covered.  Place it in the oven and bake it for about 20 minutes or until the dough looks a little golden.  Take out the dough. Take a fork and spread apart the cheese in the middle of the dough so it looks like a circular hole. Crack the egg in the middle where you make the hole. Place more cheese around the egg. Place the dough in the oven for about 5-7 minutes or until the egg is cooked. Take out the Xachapuri and let it cook for about 5-10 minutes.
